name: Spooky Tales by Candlelight (ZX Spectrum Next)
name_original: Spooky Tales by Candlelight (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Spooky Tales by Candlelight is a collection of creepy and horrific stories. Be sure to play this at night...if you have the courage.

INSTRUCTIONS
On the Story Select screen, use the LEFT and RIGHT cursor keys to rotate the flame and then SPACE to begin. The final story can only be chosen when all the others have been read. During a story, push any key to progress when the candle icon appears.

NOTES
To run, launch "SpookyTales.bas". Spooky Tales is written entirely in NextBASIC. Always hard reset your machine before running (you will also need to do this when the end is reached).
